short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends VersionOne to generate formatted (commit) message for a task.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides customizable formatted text for a task of a story or defect in VersionOne (Agile Management Tool) "Taskboard" page. This is useful for example when the code committers wish to adhere to a format in commit messages. The extension adds a (customizable) single character action link to each task on the taskboard, when clicked a formatted message is copied to the system clipboard.
